author: sussman
msg: Fix issue 900 -- using mbk's patch, tweaked a bit by sussman.
When repeatedly trying to open a repository in each parent directory,
have ra_local ignore only two specific errors.  That way the user gets
to see things like permission errors.
* split_url.c (svn_ra_local__split_URL):  when searching up the path,
throw any error other than ENOENT or SVN_ERR_REPOS_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION.

author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_wc_cleanup): Don't try to recurse into something that's not there.
